description: Jumpstart your workflow with a ready-to-run TypeScript starter featuring examples for math, greetings, time queries, image generation, and code review. Customize actions, resources, and prompts to fit your needs. Speed up prototyping by extending the included patterns.

hfToken.description: Hugging Face API token for image generation

capabilities.name: greeting
capabilities.description: Returns a greeting message in the specified language

capabilities.name: calc
capabilities.description: Performs basic arithmetic operations on two numbers

capabilities.name: time
capabilities.description: Returns the current system date and time

capabilities.name: generate_image
capabilities.description: Generates an image from a text prompt using FLUX.1-schnell model
